text:
Pardon me if its a usual question but....
Whats the status quo on "Julia on Apple's M1 processor(native)"? What about a NeuralEngine support(For Flux, especially)?

elements.text:
Pardon me if its a usual question but....
Whats the status quo on "Julia on Apple's M1 processor(native)"? What about a NeuralEngine support(For Flux, especially)?

text:
Thanks!
> `git clone <https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia>` and `make` should be enough at this point.
Hmmm... Good... I hope official downloads come soon....

elements.text: should be enough at this point.
Hmmm... Good... I hope official downloads come soon....

text: Also... any idea if a NeuralEngine support is intended?

elements.text: Also... any idea if a NeuralEngine support is intended?

text: Not planned AFAIK and won’t come anytime soon

elements.text: Not planned AFAIK and won’t come anytime soon

text: There is no public api to use the NeuralEngine, only a few smart guys reverse engineering it on the internet.

elements.text: There is no public api to use the NeuralEngine, only a few smart guys reverse engineering it on the internet.

text: I guess with M1's popularity, we'll get a proper understanding soon:slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: I guess with M1's popularity, we'll get a proper understanding soon

text:
Yeah, but se should rather hope for apple to release a library to target it.
And some Julian to devote time to wrap it.

elements.text: Yeah, but se should rather hope for apple to release a library to target it.
And some Julian to devote time to wrap it.
